body.name: KITCHENDAO Airtight Butter Dish with Lid for Countertop and Fridge, Dishwasher Safe, Plastic Butter Keeper for 2 Sticks East Coast/West Coast/European Style/Kerrygold Butter,Red
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 3 hrs
features: ✔【 Large Capacity 】 The large butter dish with cover is suitable for Eastern, Western, European style and Kerrygold butter. The butter keeper can hold up to 2 sticks of eastern butter.

✔【Sealing Ring to Keep Butter Fresh】 With a built- in sealing ring ,this airtight butter keeper seals the freshness in . It protects your butter from your cats, dust and anything else that might taint your butter.

✔【 Easy to Scoop up &Easy to Scrape 】The curved ramps at both ends of the clear butter holder help you easily scoop up butter. Slide the knife up the ramps and use the top of the ramp as a scraper to remove the remaining butter and clean your knife.

✔【 Measurement Marks & Anti-slip Bottom 】 Has TBSP marks and slight recess for the butter to stay in place. The scale lines on the butter tray can help you control the calorie intake. With Anti-slip bottom make the plastic butter holder more stable.
✔【 Dishwasher Safe 】 This Butter Container is dishwasher safe and easy to clean.
✔【 Hassle-Free Customer Service 】 After items received, if there is any problem with the items (quality, function, etc.), please don't hesitate to contact us and we will provide a reliable solution.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Butter Lover's Dream - KITCHENDAO Airtight Butter Dish Review
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I am delighted to share my experience with the KITCHENDAO Airtight Butter Dish, and I must say, it has elevated my butter storage game to a whole new level. This product truly deserves a solid five-star rating.The large capacity of this butter dish is a standout feature, accommodating Eastern, Western, European style, and even Kerrygold butter. With the ability to hold up to 2 sticks of Eastern butter, it caters to various preferences seamlessly.The built-in sealing ring is a game-changer. It not only keeps the butter fresh but also protects it from unwanted elements like dust, bugs, and even curious cats. Having soft, ready-to-spread butter on the countertop is now a constant pleasure.The design considerations are impressive. The side ramps make it easy to scoop up butter while providing a convenient place to rest the knife. The curved ramps at both ends facilitate effortless butter retrieval, and the top of the ramp doubles as a scraper to ensure no butter goes to waste.Measurement marks and an anti-slip bottom add to the functionality. The TBSP marks and slight recess keep the butter in place, aiding in portion control. The anti-slip bottom ensures stability during butter cutting, making the entire experience hassle-free.Dishwasher safe is the icing on the cake – cleaning is a breeze, adding to the convenience of this butter container.To top it off, KITCHENDAO's commitment to hassle-free customer service is commendable. Their dedication to ensuring customer satisfaction and providing reliable solutions sets them apart.In conclusion, the KITCHENDAO Airtight Butter Dish is a must-have for butter enthusiasts. It combines practicality, functionality, and thoughtful design to deliver an exceptional butter storage solution. Five stars well earned! ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It fits all sizes
reviews.reviewText: I like that it fit my Irish butter block. This is the real reason why I bought the butter dish. It also fits two regular sticks of butter or margarine side by side perfectly. I like the airtight seal too. Heavy duty plastic and well made. I would recommend this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This butter dish looks good. Holds two sticks of butter. The seal is great & love the edge to scrape excess butter off the knife. This is a solid dish and I would recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect fit for inside my refridgerator
reviews.reviewText: I bought a new refrigerator and had no place covered for my butter. This product seals tightly and fits perfectly on my door shelf. Great purchase. Easy to clean. Holds 2 normal sticks of butter.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Had the single stick tray, but wasn't found for reorder. So I went with double size, it’s not too large but that’s why the 4 star. This is great since lid stays on & bottom has a no-slip surface- best I have ever owned.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Seals tight. Practical and Stylish
reviews.reviewText: This heavy-duty butter dish does an excellent job of covering butter while it is setting out to soften up. When the lid is removed, it is easy to access the butter with a knife. I love the way it looks and is built - solid and elegant. A great gift idea.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I've been using this in the refrigerator for a month or two now and it works well. Cutting pats out of it is easy and the sticks are kept fresh and moist.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This butter dish is made of high-quality plastic-plenty of room for two sticks. Does very well in the dishwasher!
It’s very good quality, strong and beautiful design.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Fantastic butter dish, I love using it and it is so easy to manage and not have the butter all over the edges and cover.
The lid fits really well and the unit appears well made. I wouldn't gift this, which is one of the suggested features of this review.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: After smashing two glass kilner butter dishes! I decided it was time to buy a more unbreakable alternative! and it's great
This butter dish is very easy to fill and cleans nicely. It is stream lined and fits nicely on the kitchen counter. A perfect butter dish it is.
